summary: Come and see by yourselves, it's not like you have to pay for it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][color=#000000][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Georgia]
[/font][/center][center][color=#000000][font=Georgia]--------------------
-Mod name: Vampire Rogue armor.

-Mod author's: TheBlitz77, AmevenAstral9 & Lebaminoba the brazilian.

-------------------[/font][/color][color=#000000][font=Georgia]

[/font][/color][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia][youtube]W21WV-iEGVI[/youtube]
[/font][font=Georgia][youtube]sz4yMaE1nH4[/youtube]

[/font][font=Georgia][youtube]Wbxnc9HCH4A[/youtube][/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][color=#000000][font=Georgia]Thanks to our friends Supertin, GTAHammer and Hodilton for these amazing videos

[/font][/color][color=#000000][font=Georgia]
[/font][/color][color=#000000][font=Georgia]
-------------------
Russian translation by ours friends Kopasov and VoidWalker:

http://gamer-mods.ru/load/tes_v_skyrim/bronja_dlja_cbbe_unp_7b_adec/odezhda_vampir_izgoj/11-1-0-2640

http://tes-game.ru/load/skyrim/bronja_i_odezhda/7112/39-1-0-9073


-------------------
About this mod:

-This mod add a new set of Light Armors to the game (FEMALE ONLY).

-2k and 4k textures, choose what's best for you.

 Q-How can i get it??
 A-Craftable section Leather.

 Q-Where/when can i get it??
 A-Craftable at any time/at any forge.

 Q-Sleeve and Pauldron are invisible in 1Stperson!!! why???
 A-Honestly, i don't know and i don't care i never play that way!!

 Q-Combine all parts give me a high armor rating and i don't like that!!! Mr.Blitz what can i do please???
 A-Do not equipe all parts.

 Q-the enchantments are too powerful Mr.Blitz!!! can you please reduce the power of this armor???
 A-I can but i won't, besides i created an normal version.



------------------
Installation:

-Extract the contents(including folders) into your Skyrim game folder.


------------------
Uninstallation:

-Uncheck the Esp first then supprime these files, located in:
-Data/Meshes/TheBlitz/Vampire Rogue.
-Data/Textures/TheBlitz/Vampire Rogue.
-Data/Textures/cubemaps/shinydullds_e.dds
-Data/msAMV - VampireRogueArmor.esp


------------------
Require:

-BBP compatible skeleton, i recommande XP32 Maximum Skeleton (for my part i use XP32 Extended).
-SevenBase Body (any version).


------------------
Permissions:

-Please ask for my permission first, i am open to all your requests.


------------------
Dedicated to:

-Lebaminoba the brazilian & AmevenAstral9.


-----------------

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62941/?]Punisher armour 7B BBP[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80142/?]Hell armour 7B BBP[/url]


-----------------
Credits:

-Everyone's who have participate to the betterment of this amazing game, a big thanks to bethesda, each and every modder around the world and all skyrim fans.
[/font][/color][color=#000000][font=Georgia]
